meta.description: Minimize the cost of redistributing supplies among distribution centers to meet their needs.

params.name: initial_supplies
params.description: Initial supplies at each distribution center

params.name: needed_supplies
params.description: Supplies needed at each distribution center

params.name: transfer_cost
params.description: Cost to transfer supplies from one center to another

vars.name: transfer
vars.description: Amount of supplies transferred from one center to another

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(transfer[i][j] * transfer_cost[i][j] for i in CENTERS for j in CENTERS if i != j)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of transferring supplies

constraints.name: supply_balance_1
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['1'] + sum(transfer[j]['1'] for j in CENTERS if j != '1') - sum(transfer['1'][j] for j in CENTERS if j != '1')
constraints.description: Ensure center 1 meets its supply needs

constraints.name: supply_balance_2
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['2'] + sum(transfer[j]['2'] for j in CENTERS if j != '2') - sum(transfer['2'][j] for j in CENTERS if j != '2')
constraints.description: Ensure center 2 meets its supply needs

constraints.name: supply_balance_3
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['3'] + sum(transfer[j]['3'] for j in CENTERS if j != '3') - sum(transfer['3'][j] for j in CENTERS if j != '3')
constraints.description: Ensure center 3 meets its supply needs

constraints.name: supply_balance_4
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['4'] + sum(transfer[j]['4'] for j in CENTERS if j != '4') - sum(transfer['4'][j] for j in CENTERS if j != '4')
constraints.description: Ensure center 4 meets its supply needs

constraints.name: supply_balance_5
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['5'] + sum(transfer[j]['5'] for j in CENTERS if j != '5') - sum(transfer['5'][j] for j in CENTERS if j != '5')
constraints.description: Ensure center 5 meets its supply needs

constraints.name: supply_balance_6
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['6'] + sum(transfer[j]['6'] for j in CENTERS if j != '6') - sum(transfer['6'][j] for j in CENTERS if j != '6')
constraints.description: Ensure center 6 meets its supply needs

constraints.name: supply_balance_7
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['7'] + sum(transfer[j]['7'] for j in CENTERS if j != '7') - sum(transfer['7'][j] for j in CENTERS if j != '7')
constraints.description: Ensure center 7 meets its supply needs
